hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #2# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Invisible Blades Room

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Dodongo's Cavern Compass#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Bomb Bag#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Barinade# holds...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say Ganondorf's bolts can be reflected with glass or steel.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Bow#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Bomb Bag#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Slingshot#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: I was voted least helpful hint stone five years in a row!

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Shadow Temple#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Zora Scale# and #Farore's Wind#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Sun's Song#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #the Key#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.
